front.title: Extensions to RSVP-TE for LSP Ingress Local Protection

abstract.t: This document describes extensions to Resource Reservation Protocol - Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) for locally protecting the ingress node of a Traffic Engineered (TE) Label Switched Path (LSP), which is a Point-to-Point (P2P) LSP or a Point-to-Multipoint (P2MP) LSP.
